column1: About Argus
Argus is an independent media organization with 1
column2: 300 staff. It is headquartered in London and has 29 offices in the world’s principal commodity trading and production centers. Argus produces price assessments and analysis of international energy and other commodity markets and offers bespoke consulting services and industry-leading conferences. Companies in 140 countries around the world use Argus data to index physical trade and as benchmarks in financial derivative markets as well as for analysis and planning purposes.

column1: Argus was founded in 1970 and is a privately held UK-registered company. It is owned by employee shareholders

column1: Job Purpose and Impact

The Analytics Data Process Analyst will develop an in depth understanding of the business to innovate significant data driven insights to help business leaders make better decisions and will develop and combine subject matter expertise in key data domains. Our aim is to empower the business to unlock value from data assets
column2: uplift analytical capabilities and support data-driven decision making across the organization. In this role
column3: you will act as a partner with internal stakeholders and technical staff to execute a business technology strategy that delivers reporting and analytics solutions. You will work closely with business teams to help explore how data and analytics solutions can address business needs. Together with business and technical stakeholders at the group
column4: functional and regional level you will co-create and deliver data and analytics solutions.

You will work under minimal supervision and independently handle complex issues while referring only the most complex issues to higher-level staff.

column1: The worldwide data management software market is massive (IDC forecasts it to be $138 billion by 2026!). At MongoDB we are transforming industries and empowering developers to build amazing apps that people use every day. We are the leading modern data platform and the first database provider to IPO in over 20 years. Join our team and be at the forefront of innovation and creativity.
Click here to learn more about our Technical Services team.
To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees

Archer is an aerospace company based in San Jose

column1: What we are looking for:
We are looking for an experienced Embedded Software Engineer to join the software team at Archer. The role consists in designing
column2: developing and testing safety critical software for Archer’s fault tolerant flight controls system.

column1: What you’ll do:
Develop safety critical software components for Archer’s flight control system.
Participate in planning
Work with system engineers to decompose item requirements into high level and low level software requirements in compliance with DO-178C.
Work with a multi-disciplinary team to develop and integrate the complex hardware/software flight control system.
Development of software plans
Software requirements decomposition
Software design and development
column5: operation and cost optimization trade studies

column1: Software analyses
Contribute to the continuous improvement of our processes to increase safety and efficiency.
What you need:
5+ years of experience in a flight control software or a related field
Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering
Proficiency with C/C++
Experience with MATLAB/Simulink
Fluency with widely used scripting languages like bash and Python
Experience developing software complying with safety standards like DO-178C or ISO 26262 to high criticality levels (DAL-A/B)
Understanding of communication standards and protocols (RS-422/485
Familiarity with debuggers and lab instruments such oscilloscopes and bus analyzers
Experience with Model Based Software development and certification (DO-331)
Excellent organizational and communication skills
Bonus Qualifications
Experience with VHDL and/or Verilog development
Familiarity with modeling tools like UML or SysML
Knowledge of Real Time Operating Systems (RTOS) and multi-threading
Experience in Linux
Experience with DO-254
Experience with tools qualification (DO-330)

General information
All posting locations São Paulo
Job Function 03 - Finance
Date Published 09-May-2023
Description & Requirements
Vaga direcionada para mulheres e pessoas negras
OBJETIVO

O analista deverá apoiar o gestor no que tange as atualizações dos sistemas SAP/DFe/Mastersaf. Acompanhar diariamente as alterações de legislação identificando os impactos sistêmicos (SAP/Mastersaf). Contribuir nas atividades ligadas a parametrização dos sistemas SAP sobre as regras fiscais- promovendo a criação e manutenção dos registros fiscais nas tabelas do SAP (J1BTAX/Namespace). Ajudar na elaboração de documentos de treinamentos sistêmicos SAP/DFe/Mastersaf.
PRINCIPAIS RESPONSABILIDADES
Apoiar o gestor nos projetos de TI.
Apoiar novas demandas dos projetos.
Ajudar nas demandas de parametrização dos sistemas SAP/Mastersaf.
Elaborar treinamento para o time na finalização dos projetos/melhorias.
Acompanhar diariamente a evolução dos testes com as áreas responsáveis.
REQUISITOS
Superior completo nas áreas de contabilidade ou administração.
Conhecimento em Pacote Office.
Conhecimento nas transações SAP (J1BTAX/J1BNFE/SE16/Namespace).
Conhecimento SAP/Mastersaf/DFe.
Dialogar e ser ativo na resolução dos problemas junto com as demais áreas da companhia.

column1: Role Description
The Success Delivery Center (SDC) is an organization that provides remote/onsite SAP consulting services to SAP customers. It is a global team with centers in EMEA

We are growing the São Leopoldo based near-shore center to expand our delivery capabilities within the Latin American region. Our desire is to provide SAP’s customers access to the best global network of consultants with expertise in SAP’s latest technologies. The São Leopoldo near shore center is a sophisticated Service & Knowledge organization providing unique capabilities to SAP’s customers on their implementations of innovation products.

column1: Flexible offerings. Choose how many hours you want to work and how much you want to earn.
Swag! Because who doesn’t love swag?

The Gigster Talent Network is a highly curated set of the best software developers in the world. It’s not easy to become part of this select network - but when you do - you will work amongst the best from Silicon Valley and around the world.

Our model is unique in the software development industry. We do the hard work of finding the US clients and scoping their projects - and you get to choose from a large variety of ‘Gigs’. You can choose Gigs that fit your schedule - from 10
column3: or 40 hours a week. You also get to choose your pay rate. All projects are staffed with a project manager

column1: All of our projects are for top-tier US companies and are delivered with the highest quality. Projects range from developing NFT marketplaces to VR imaging for medical use to large AI/ML projects. We even produce a case study for every project delivered - so you can take that with you as part of your portfolio.

In parallel - you will have access to an exclusive and energized network of the world’s most skilled experts. Community members collaborate inside and outside of Gigs - as well as at local community events
column4: etc. The Gigster Talent Network is more than a simple marketplace - it’s truly an exclusive club.

column1: Get to Know Our Team

The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases

We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. column7: and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it

column1: Get to Know our Team:

The Supply Analytics team is a team of creative entrepreneurs that develop solutions for Agoda’s accommodation partners and promote Agoda’s top and bottom-line growth. We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources
column2: we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda
column3: introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

column1: The team is a fast growing and dynamic team within Supply department of Agoda. The team is responsible for developing and scaling a range of marketing solutions for accommodation partners focusing on growth

As a Senior Analyst

You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Flight Commercial Team members within Agoda.

column1: Get to Know our Team:

The Supply Analytics team is a team of creative entrepreneurs that develop solutions for Agoda’s accommodation partners and promote Agoda’s top and bottom-line growth. We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources
column2: we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda
column3: introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.

column1: The team is a fast growing and dynamic team within Supply department of Agoda. The team is responsible for developing and scaling a range of marketing solutions for accommodation partners focusing on growth
column5: as well as advertising and display marketing solutions for businesses and travel organizations.

column1: The Opportunity:
As a Senior Analyst
column2: you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Flight Commercial Team members within Agoda.

column1: Data Engineer;{'name': 'Turing'

A fast-paced healthcare company on a mission to bring new medical innovations to the market is looking for a Data Engineer. The selected candidate will be responsible for creating and constructing highly scalable data pipelines to support the business of data solutions. The company increasing its skills as a specialized healthcare provider and actively rising. This is an exciting opportunity for developers who are eager to work in a fast-paced innovative environment. This position requires 6+ hours of overlap with the SGT time zone.
Job Responsibilities:
Apply DataOps methodologies and establish best practices for ETL processes across various architecture tools

Design
column2: develop and maintain scalable ETL processes

column1: Establish version control of ETL processes and enable CI/CD pipelines

Support and contribute to the development standards for data pipelines
Develop capabilities to improve the data quality and integrity of the database systems
Job Requirements:
Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering
At least 3+ years of relevant experience as a data engineer
A minimum of 2+ years of experience in managing data warehouses and data pipelines in systems
Excellent problem-solving skills when working with both structured / unstructured datasets
Demonstrable experience building and optimizing data pipelines
Working knowledge of data visualization tools
A minimum of 2+ years of experience in delivering hands-on technical projects
Database development experience (SQL programming
Familiarity in Data warehousing concept
Exposure to cloud ecosystem (preferably Azure)
Working knowledge on API design and management

Job Description

Estamos em busca de um Business Innovation Developer para o nosso Lab de Produtos dentro da diretoria de Pesquisa e Inovação de Take Blip. O “Lab” é uma estrutura dedicada a experimentar novas soluções dentro de Take Blip
column2: baseado em tendências de mercado e oportunidades de negócio. Esse processo de laboratório experimental visa reduzir riscos na implementação de inovações e provar potencial de novas soluções
column3: gerando também aprendizados ao longo do processo.

column1: Nossa diretoria é multidisciplinar
column6: engenharia de software e produto. Se você tem paixão por desenvolvimento

column1: Responsibilities and assignments
No papel de Business Innovation Developer dentro do Lab
column2: você atuará em projetos estratégicos de inovação em Take Blip
column3: desenvolvendo a prototipagem de ponta a ponta de novas PoCs (provas de conceito) para testar viabilidade técnica e de valor de novas soluções junto a potenciais clientes.

column1: Para este papel
column5: capaz de atuar em diferentes desafios e com habilidades técnicas de desenvolvimento e de negócio.

column1: Havendo a necessidade de testar soluções que exijam o uso da Inteligência Artificial
column3: você poderá contar com a participação destes perfis de profissionais
column4: que serão selecionados dentro da diretoria de Pesquisa e Inovação
column5: conforme a necessidade do projeto. Todas as experimentações são realizadas por meio de interações em ciclos curtos e avanços com base nos aprendizados validados com o cliente e serão priorizadas conforme o potencial de geração de novos negócios/receita para a Take Blip.

column1: About Argus
Argus is an independent media organization with 1
column2: 300 staff. It is headquartered in London and has 29 offices in the world’s principal commodity trading and production centers. Argus produces price assessments and analysis of international energy and other commodity markets and offers bespoke consulting services and industry-leading conferences. Companies in 140 countries around the world use Argus data to index physical trade and as benchmarks in financial derivative markets as well as for analysis and planning purposes.

column1: Argus was founded in 1970 and is a privately held UK-registered company. It is owned by employee shareholders
column2: global growth equity firm General Atlantic and Hg

column1: Responsibilities
